name: Jettison (Hamra Digital)
description:
is a fast-paced over-the-shoulder arena shooter where players take the role of cyber-samurai battling for dominance on the streets of Neo New York. All match play takes place in local split-screen multiplayer, but leverages cutting-edge Challonge tournament technology to enhance the stakes of every bout. Grab a friend to dash and shoot your way to victory!

Made for the DEV EXP Game Jam

T h i s   g a m e   r e q u i r e s   t w o   p l a y e r s .

This game is a prototype, and as such may be unoptimized for lower end computers. 

This game is built with controllers in mind, however there are limited functions available to keyboard and mouse players, as the menus require use of a mouse to navigate.

C o n t r o l s : C o n t r o l l e r :

Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Look
A: Jump
B: Dash
Right Trigger: Shoot

M o u s e  a n d  K e y b o a r d :

W: Move Forwards
A: Move Left
S: Move Backwards
D: Move Right
Mouse: Look
Left Click: Shoot
Left Control: Dash
